RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer

RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer Class Reference

#include <addserver.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The xident add server dialog.

It is used by the xIdent tool to add a server using curlServerAdd.

Definition at line 43 of file addserver.h.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::create (  )  [virtual]

The FOX-Toolkit create method.

It creates the instance of FXDialogBox and set the placement behavior to PLACEMENT_SCREEN.

Definition at line 166 of file addserver.cpp.

bool RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::controls (  )  [private]

Control the entered values before adding the server.

The most important error must be tested last because the error message stored in the errorMsg variable will be overriden.

Returns:
true if the server can be added

Definition at line 180 of file addserver.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::addServer (  )  [private]

Adds the server.

This method uses the dialog's informations with CurlServerAdd to submit an administration form to add the server. It is called by the onOkClicked callback is the controls found no error.

Definition at line 207 of file addserver.cpp.

Member Data Documentation

const char* RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::errorMsg [private]

An error string used for validation error.

This string is fed up by the controls() function to send an error message if the controls failed. The onOkClicked() function shows it in a fox message box if the validation failed.
